title: Anthony Bourdain | A Closer Look: Mueller Indicts Three Former Trump Officials In Russia Investigation
description:
Seth takes a closer look at special counsel Robert Mueller's first charges in his investigation of the Trump campaign's potential ties to Russia.

Then, Anthony Bourdain tells Seth about the difficulties of filming Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown and why Romanian newspapers accused him of being a Mossad agent. He also discusses the troubles Puerto Rico faced before and after the hurricane, and why he's apologized about perpetuating the oppressive "meathead culture" in cuisine.

After that, Bourdain talks to Late Night producer Henry Melcher about how hipsters have shaped food culture and his meal with President Obama.
